items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Utility Bill from London City Utilities issued on 2023-01-15.
Data available for years 2020-2022, Ellipro scores provided.
Bank account and postal details verified for GB jurisdiction.
Address matches the legal address provided in SQL database.
Multiple compliance statuses available: AML Compliant, Industry License under review.
Business scope includes banking and financial services with national coverage.
PEP status includes both resolved and under investigation screening results.
Revenue details reported in the annual report: Net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for 2023.
Market capitalization reported in the annual report: 489,320 million dollars as of December 31, 2023.
